sentences: Romina Basso (born Gorizia) is an Italian mezzo-soprano with an extensive discography of baroque opera recordings.
She is particularly noted for her performances of Vivaldi.
Vivaldi, New Discoveries I. Modo Antiquo, Federico Maria Sardelli
La Risonanza, Fabio Bonizzoni, Mark Tucker, Ruth Rosique, Roberta Invernizzi, Franziska Gottwald
